title: Emerald and Diamond Raasi Necklace - Pancharatna Haram
materials: G-H color). The pendant features a high-quality
features: This exquisitely crafted necklace features a contemporary design inspired by traditional Telugu harams. The gold chain boasts an openwork design, interspersed with Emeralds and Diamond-studded floral motifs. The elaborate pendant is a stunning showcase of diamond pave setting around strategically placed emeralds, culminating in delicate gold bead drops. Features a modern take on the 'Chandbali' design aesthetic. Has a secure S-hook clasp.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. Ideal for contemporary brides looking for a blend of tradition and modernity. Also suitable for events like Seemantham or Half-Saree Function.
description: This Pancharatna Haram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures enduring value and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish imparts a rich, lustrous finish. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional silk sarees and modern evening wear, making it a treasured heirloom.
